channel.title: Operation Black Mesa
channel.description:
Just wanted to start a discussion about the "Operation Black Mesa" Mod
[url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/operation-black-mesa[/url]
I havnt heard any news since March, anything would be nice.
In the mean time How do we all feel about the upcoming mod? I for one am very exited ! I have followed BMS since it was first announced, I am completely amazed at the amount of community support that comes with this free to download mod. I simply cant wait for Operation black mesa, in the mean time lets reminisce about opposing force.
[url]https://half-life.wikia.com/wiki/Half-Life:_Opposing_Force_storyline[/url]

item.description:
Yep. Redundant thread is redundant.

Read full topic

item.title: Operation Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
I’m not sure what we’re supposed to be discussing here, you seem more interested in talking about BM. Plus we’ve already got an OBM thread.
